get.description: Retrieve available languages with translated full label, short label, code and locale

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description:
Optional language override. Highest priority.

Language resolution order:
1) Query parameter: ?lang
2) Header: x-lang
3) Authenticated user language
4) Default language (Ukrainian  uk)

The value is case-insensitive and may be either:
- a plain language code (e.g. "en", "EN", "uk")
- a locale code (e.g. "en-US", "EN_us", "uk-UA")

The value will be normalized internally to a supported LanguageCode.

parameters.name: x-lang
parameters.description:
Optional language override. Lower priority than ?lang.

Language resolution order:
1) Query parameter: ?lang
2) Header: x-lang
3) Authenticated user language
4) Default language (Ukrainian  uk)

The value is case-insensitive and may be either:
- a plain language code (e.g. "en", "EN", "uk")
- a locale code (e.g. "en-US", "EN_us", "uk-UA")

The value will be normalized internally to a supported LanguageCode.
